attributes.action: Ban the nightime consumption of alcohol in all public places including bars and pubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alcohol leads to violence. This is a FACT that is impossible to deny and the government knows it! Alcohol is enjoyable but should only be allowed to be drunk in private homes. The use in public is ruining society and preventing law abiding citizens from going out at night on the weekends. The government has an obligation under law to stop it!! We ask the PM to ban it's use in public after 9pm
